title: Where’s Wout? Van Aert Back on Bike and Eyeing Cyclocross Season after Devastating Vuelta Crash
content:
Visma-Lease a Bike confirms Van Aert will ride short, select CX campaign after nasty knee injury in build back to spring classics.

Read the full article at Where’s Wout? Van Aert Back on Bike and Eyeing Cyclocross Season after Devastating Vuelta Crash on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
